title: The Man
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:07.75] I would be complex
[00:09.15] I would be cool
[00:11.38] They'd say I played the ﬁeld before I found someone to commit to
[00:15.33] And that would be ok
[00:17.83] For me to do
[00:20.14] Every conquest I had made would make me more of a boss to you
[00:25.80] I'd be a fearless leader
[00:28.48] I'd be an alpha type
[00:30.47] When everyone believes ya
[00:32.42] What's that like?
[00:34.24] I'm so sick of running as fast as I can
[00:38.12] Wondering if I'd get there quicker
[00:40.01] If I was a man
[00:42.09] And I'm so sick of them coming at me again
[00:46.01] 'Cause if I was a man
[00:48.13] Then I'd be the man
[00:50.57] I'd be the man
[00:55.05] I'd be the man
[00:59.92] They'd say I hustled
[01:01.52] Put in the work
[01:03.48] They wouldn't shake their heads and question how much of this I deserve
[01:07.50] What I was wearing
[01:10.00] If I was rude
[01:12.43] Could all be separated from my good ideas and power moves?
[01:18.56] And they would toast to me, oh
[01:20.86] Let the players play
[01:22.99] I'd be just like Leo
[01:25.02] In Saint-Tropez
[01:27.08] I'm so sick of running as fast as I can
[01:30.48] Wondering if I'd get there quicker
[01:33.06] If I was a man
[01:35.13] And I'm so sick of them coming at me again
[01:39.13] 'Cause if I was a man
[01:41.54] Then I'd be the man
[01:43.77] I'd be the man
[01:47.85] I'd be the man
[01:51.69] What's it like to brag about
[01:52.68] Raking in dollars
[01:53.93] And getting bitches and models
[01:56.06] And it's all good if you're bad
[01:58.00] And it's okay if you're mad
[02:00.17] If I was out ﬂashing my dollars
[02:02.68] I'd be a bitch, not a baller
[02:04.71] They paint me out to be bad
[02:06.97] So it's okay that I'm mad
[02:10.40] I'm so sick of running as fast as I can
[02:14.55] Wondering if I'd get there quicker if I was a man (you know that)
[02:19.14] And I'm so sick of them coming at me again (coming at me again)
[02:22.85] 'Cause if I was a man (if I was a man)
[02:25.57] Then I'd be the man (then I'd be the man)
[02:27.87] I'm so sick of running as fast as I can (as fast as I can)
[02:31.95] Wondering if I'd get there quicker if I was a man (hey)
[02:36.37] And I'm so sick of them coming at me again (coming at me again)
[02:40.17] 'Cause if I was a man (if I was a man), then I'd be the man
[02:44.68] I'd be the man
[02:48.73] I'd be the man (oh)
[02:53.03] I'd be the man (yeah)
[02:57.38] I'd be the man (I'd be the man)
[03:05.36] If I was a man
[03:09.12] Then I'd be the man
[03:12.57]
